text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $8$ units.
The measure of angle $ADE$ is $30$ degrees.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
The line connecting $D$ and $E$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $E$ and $A$.
The length of the line $DA$ is equal to the length of the line $CB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $BC$, $CD$, and $DA$, forming the trapezoid $ABCD$.
